cause.description:
He may be small and furry but this little guy has a big heart. Underneath those dreadlocks lies real love and effection. He is a simple creature, enjoys walks and the occasional bone. We need your help in continuing to provide for Nero. Do something wonderful every day.
1. Nero has the right to a decent meal each day.
2. Nero has the right to travel to new and interesting country parks.
cause.mission: Provide a better quality of life for this poor animal
cause.name: Friends Of Nero
